overview:
Pete Hayes is a CMO for Chief Outsiders, LLC

Pete Hayes provides outsourced executive marketing services for growing and mid-sized companies through Chief Outsiders, LLC. Prior to joining Chief Outsiders, he was the vice president of global integrated marketing for Advanced Micro Devices (AMD).

Hayes spent 11 years in technology-marketing agency SicolaMartin (part of Young & Rubicam) based in Austin.

Hayes also led marketing organizations at IBM, E-mu Systems, and Businessland.
